content:
{"name": "Trinity’s Services & Food for the Homeless Inc", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We have partnered with Plentiful to provide appointments to our guests for the pantry. To schedule an appointment:
Two options:
Download the app here. Available for Android on the Google Play store. (Not available for iOS)
Via Text Message
Text the word "SAFH" to 726-879 (PANTRY)
Wait for the system to text you back - this may take a few minutes.
Respond to the questions that the system asks (e.g. Name, Date of Birth, Zip Code, Number of People in the Household, etc.)
Select your preferred appointment date and time
• If for your first time, you don't have anything, that is no problem. You will still be served, but only receive food for one person, and not your entire household. You will need to bring documentation with you next time.", "email": "", "url": "https://safhnyc.org/how-to-get-food/food", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "602 East 9th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10009", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7260344, "longitude": -73.980189}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 228-5254", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Schedule appointment through PLENTIFUL app"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
